statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication_data;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication_data ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_data WHERE two_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_authentication_data;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication_data WHERE password_hash = 'abc123' AND two_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_data WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_authentication_data WHERE two_factor_auth = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication_data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_authentication_data WHERE two_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2 OR username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT session_id, login_time FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, login_time FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM user_sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 'a6a41201-44c7-4f41-ae54-7a0f28d55d76';
SELECT username,email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(auth_token) AS token_count FROM user_credentials GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, uc.auth_token, us.login_time FROM users u JOIN user_credentials uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN user_sessions us ON u.user_id = us.user_id ORDER BY us.login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT user_id, log_message FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_token, refresh_token FROM user_tokens WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 2 AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_timestamp, ua.activity_details FROM users u INNER JOIN user_activities ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

SELECT users.username, user_activities.activity_timestamp FROM users JOIN user_activities ON users.user_id = user_activities.user_id WHERE users.username = 'alice_smith' ORDER BY user_activities.activity_timestamp DESC;
